Show a confirmation dialog before making calls.
Enable banners "Notifications" for some interactions (saving, marking as seen).
Integrate save and seen options into Snapchat action menu, instead of showing overlay buttons.
Sent snaps will be shown only in your side of the chat, so you may know what snaps you've sent.
Skip to the next snap when marked as seen. Alternatively, pressing the button again will mark as unseen.
Automatically mark all non-friends stories as seen.
Show a confirmation dialog for sending screenshots notification.
Show an overlay button to upload media from Camera Roll.
Show an overlay button to mark snaps and stories as seen.
Show an overlay button to save media.
Show an overlay button to send screenshot notification.
Show a button in chat to rapidly send screenshot notifications as a PRANK.
Enable all snapchat experiments (like UI stuff)
Restore button positions to default configuration.
Stop chats from being deleted (only works while chat is open).
Show a confirmation dialog to save a voice-message to a folder (must listen to the whole voice-message first).
Upload videos longer than 10sec as one snap (Must take a quick video snap after choosing a video).
Use the location selector below to change location.
Choose the location from the map (Requires enabling "Spoof Location").
Tap a friend on the SnapMap to teleport to them.
Enter a number to spoof story views (Leave blank to disable).
Enter a number to spoof story screenshots (Leave blank to disable).
Open links in chat using safari.
Hide the blue button on the bottom on recent UI versions.
Removes the stupid TikTok knock-off tab (Requires app restart).
Randomly change the order of the best friends list.
Content will loop rather than skip to the next.
Enter a number for the chat pin limit.
Use dark mode in this settings menu.
Hide title and subtitle from the main pages (Requires app restart).
Gives the Iota header RBG (ChromaHomeBarX Style).
Pick a theme for Iota's buttons, pull to refresh, and settings.
Opens a log window for debugging.
